logline: Two mischievous factory workers play a harmless prank on their cautious coworker during a shift in an early 1900s factory.
art_style: Friendly cartoon silent-film vibe, black-and-white, cel-shaded with grainy texture

background.description: A gritty early 1900s factory floor with machinery, pipes, and hanging lamps casting stark shadows.

characters.name: EDWARD
characters.description: Mid-30s, tall, lean, mischievous ringleader in grease-stained overalls and flat cap
characters.prompt: tall lean man, grease-stained overalls, flat cap, mischievous expression, black-and-white grainy silent film style

characters.name: HARRY
characters.description: Late 20s, stockier, jovial accomplice with suspenders and rolled sleeves
characters.prompt: stocky man, suspenders, rolled sleeves, grinning, black-and-white grainy silent film style

characters.name: GEORGE
characters.description: Early 30s, unsuspecting victim, neat cap and vest, cautious demeanor
characters.prompt: man with neat cap and vest, cautious expression, black-and-white grainy silent film style

beats.description: Edward and Harry exchange sly glances on the factory floor.
dialogue: EDWARD: Ready? When George gets here, lift the lever.
HARRY: He'll never see it coming.

beats.description: George walks over, adjusting his cap. Edward nods; Harry pulls the lever. A puff of air startles George; a harmless string dangles.
dialogue: EDWARD: Just a bit of fun to lighten the shift.
